name: Reyna Valorant Clone
description:
[Early Alpha Stage]This is a clone from valorant only one agent and that is name is Reyna. Reyna ca do op stuff like go thru walls and other things

-I im the only one who works on this game so any bugs just please post it on issue page on my github. so i can fix em.

Credit the yoyo games that has beast engine that made my life MUCH easier.
